mapper.update: update tb_agent a set a.commpay_name=#{commpayName}, a.person= #{person}, a.phone=#{phone}, a.province=#{province}, a.city=#{city}, a.district =#{district}, a.address =#{address}, a.trading_img=#{tradingImg}, a.status= #{status}, a.add_consumer_id=#{addConsumerId}, a.add_date =#{addDate}, a.is_del=#{isDel} where a.id = #{id}
update tb_agent a set a.is_del = 1 where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select concat(t.id,'')as id, t.commpay_name,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, t.status as status, case when t.status =1 then '待审核' when t.status =2 then '审核通过' when t.status =3 then '审核未通过' else '未知' end as statustext,t.province as provinceId,t.city as cityId,t.district as districtId, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate,t.login_name as loginName, t.trading_img ,t.check_remark checkRemark,t.type tyep from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0 and t.add_consumer_id=#{ConsumerId}

select t.id id, t.commpay_name,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate, t.trading_img,t.status as status, case when t.status =1 then '待审核' when t.status =2 then '审核通过' when t.status =3 then '审核未通过' else '未知' end as statustext from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0
and t.commpay_name like "%"#{param.commpayName}"%"
and t.person like "%"#{param.person}"%"
and t.status = #{param.status}

select t.id as id, t.commpay_name as commpayName,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate, t.trading_img as tradingImg,t.status as status,t.add_consumer_id as addConsumerId, case when t.status =1 then '待审核' when t.status =2 then '审核通过' when t.status =3 then '审核未通过' else '未知' end as statustext,t.check_remark as checkRemark from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0 and t.id =#{id}
